QueryDefinition.Query: With ch AS( select person_id from {sc}.chunk_person where chunk_id = {0} ), constype AS( select code, text from {sc}.lookup where lookup_type_id = 18 ),x AS( SELECT distinct i.eventdate, i.patid, i.staffid, i.immstype, m.readcode, concat(i.patid,to_char(i.eventdate,'YYYYMMDD'), coalesce(con.constype, 99)) as temp_visit_occurrence_id, -- nextval('{sc}.visit_detail_id_seq') as visit_occurrence_id, MOD(i.patid, 100000) as care_site_id, constype.text as description, con.constype from ch join {sc}.immunisation i on i.patid = ch.person_id join {sc}.consultation con on i.patid = con.patid and i.consid = con.consid left join constype on constype.code = con.constype left join {sc}.Medical m on (i.medcode = m.medcode) -- where i.eventdate is not null -- and con.eventdate is not null ) select x.*, nextval('{sc}.visit_detail_id_seq') as visit_occurrence_id from x order by x.patid
